bibl.title: Letter from Ralph Cooper Hutchison to John J. Moran, September 30, 1940

div1.p: Hutchison wants to know Moran's middle name for the certificate inscription and is delighted the Morans will attend.

div1.head: Letter from Ralph Cooper Hutchison to John J. Moran, September 30, 1940

opener.dateline:
THE PRESIDENT'S OFFICE
WASHINGTON AND JEFFERSON COLLEGE
WASHINGTON, PENNSYLVANIA
September 30, 1940

div1.p:
I wonder if you would send to us by return
air mail information as to your middle name. We
are preparing an inscription for Founders' Day
which will be presented to you and we would like
to have your full name on it. We are delighted
that you are coming and hope that Mrs. Moran will
be with you.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Ralph Cooper Hutchison Mr. John J. Moran
Compania Sunoco de Cuba
Avanedia Menocal 455-457
Havana, Cuba
RCH/H
